Getting an NPE when calling setVisible looks like an SWT bug to me.

Bug 56887 triggers this NPE

setVisible(false) causes the QuickOutline's deactivate listener to be fired
which tells the Quick Outline to dispose itself and then later setVisible fails
with the NPE. setVisible should not fail with an NPE, at most it could throw a
widgetDisposed error.
Rafael, can you please quickly retest the fix?  Thanks.

I tried with N20040401, and I have the same behavior (quick outline/hierarchy
appears and disappears instantly). The difference is that now I don't see any
entries being added to the log.

Reopening (don't know if it is a SWT thing, though).
Rafeal, bug 56887 is causing the Outline to close. The NPE was just a side effect.
*** Bug 56975 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
